name: Bike Mania: Office Moto
description:
Bike Mania : Office Moto – The creators of one of the most popular motorcycle racing game series ever programmed are back with an exciting new adventure. In Bike Mania : Office Moto, riders are being taken somewhere they have never been forced to race before – their offices! Using special technology, riders and their bikes have been shrunk and must now overcome obstacles that have been placed in their way. These obstacles include things like telephones, staplers and other random office supplies. Be the fastest racer to cross the finish to advance to further levels.
To control your micro racers, you will need speed, balance and even a small amount of luck. The controls are basic and easy to learn, but the racing will take longer to master. Use the left and right arrow keys to lean into your bike. Speed and direction will be controlled using the up and down arrow keys.
